componentDescription: A user-friendly tool for selecting and inserting emojis into text inputs or forms.

id.description: Optional identifier for the component's root element.

name.description: Optional name attribute for form submission, if used in a form context.

label.description: Optional label text to describe the emoji picker input.

placeholder.description: Optional placeholder text displayed when no emoji is selected.

helperText.description: Optional helper text providing additional guidance or information.

value.description: The controlled value of the selected emoji.

defaultValue.description: The uncontrolled default value for the selected emoji.

onChange.description: Callback function triggered when the emoji selection changes, returning the emoji string.

onEmojiSelect.description: Callback function triggered when an emoji is explicitly selected, returning the full Emoji object.

views.description: Optional styles object to customize the visual appearance of the emoji picker.

size.description: Optional size variant for the emoji picker component.

shape.description: Optional shape variant for the emoji picker component.

variant.description: Optional visual variant for the emoji picker component.

error.description: Boolean indicating if the emoji picker is in an error state.

isDisabled.description: Boolean indicating if the emoji picker input is disabled.

isReadOnly.description: Boolean indicating if the emoji picker input is read-only.

showSearch.description: Boolean to control the visibility of the search input within the picker.

showCategories.description: Boolean to control the visibility of emoji category tabs.

showRecentEmojis.description: Boolean to control the visibility of the 'Recent Emojis' section.

maxRecentEmojis.description: Maximum number of recent emojis to display.

enabledCategories.description: An array of EmojiCategory values to enable and display.

customEmojis.description: An array of custom Emoji objects to include in the picker.

isOpen.description: Boolean to control the open/closed state of the emoji picker dropdown.

onOpen.description: Callback function triggered when the emoji picker dropdown opens.

onClose.description: Callback function triggered when the emoji picker dropdown closes.

closeOnSelect.description: Boolean to specify if the picker should close automatically after an emoji is selected.

aria-label.description: ARIA label for accessibility, describing the component's purpose.

aria-describedby.description: ARIA describedby attribute for accessibility, linking to an element that provides a description.
